frame.if_detail: Add an 𝐢𝐟 conditional statement at the frame cursor.
frame.import_detail: Add an 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 statement at the frame cursor.
frame.elif_detail: Add an 𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐟 (else if) conditional statement at the frame cursor.
frame.else_detail: Add an 𝐞𝐥𝐬𝐞 conditional statement at the frame cursor.
frame.for_detail: Add a 𝐟𝐨𝐫 loop at the frame cursor.
frame.funcdef_detail: Add a function definition at the frame cursor.
frame.fromimport_detail: Add a 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦...𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 statement at the frame cursor.
frame.while_detail: Add a 𝐰𝐡𝐢𝐥𝐞 loop at the frame cursor.
frame.break_detail: Add a 𝐛𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐤 statement at the frame cursor
frame.continue_detail: Add a 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐞 statement at the frame cursor.
frame.varassign_detail: Add a variable assignment at the frame cursor.
frame.funccall_detail: Add a function call at the frame cursor.
frame.blank_detail: Add a blank frame at the frame cursor.
frame.return_detail: Add a 𝐫𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧 statement at the frame cursor.
frame.comment_detail: Add a comment at the frame cursor.
frame.try_detail: Add a 𝐭𝐫𝐲 statement at the frame cursor.
frame.raise_detail: Add a 𝐫𝐚𝐢𝐬𝐞 statement at the frame cursor.
frame.except_detail: Add an 𝐞𝐱𝐜𝐞𝐩𝐭 statement at the frame cursor.
frame.finally_detail: Add a 𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐲 statement at the frame cursor.
frame.with_detail: Add a 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 statement at the frame cursor.
frame.global_detail: Add a 𝐠𝐥𝐨𝐛𝐚𝐥 statement at the frame cursor. This keyword allows to modify a variable 𝑔𝑙𝑜𝑏𝑎𝑙𝑙𝑦, from inside a function.
